mapper.insert: insert into user(profileImage, nickName, email, password, pwQId, p_answer) values(#{profileImage}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{password}, #{pwQId}, #{pwA})
mapper.update: update user set profileImage=#{profileImage}, nickName=#{nickName}, password=#{password}, pwQId=#{pwQId}, pwA=#{pwA} where userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select * from user where email Like CONCAT('%',#{email},'%')
